name: aqua-ring
flavor_text: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
effect_text_extend:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect_text_simple: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.
